name: UNiagaraDataInterfaceAudioSpectrum
doc: Data Interface allowing sampling of recent audio spectrum.

Resolution: The number of spectrum samples to pass to the GPU
MinimumFrequency: The minimum frequency represented in the spectrum.
MaximumFrequency: The maximum frequency represented in the spectrum.
NoiseFloorDb: The decibel level considered as silence. This is used to scale the output of the spectrum.
